name: THE CHOSEN WIZARD
desc:
Ancient runes call to the keeper of secrets!
Your words are spells of stardust.
Release the power sleeping in the tablets
deep beneath the island of Zinland.

name: STAR ARCHER
desc:
Your gaze is precise as a lunar arrow.
Every word flies without missing.
Follow the paths of wind and silence,
to catch elusive meanings.

name: RUNIC KNIGHT
desc:
Your sword is a word, your shield is an oath.
You stand between chaos and meaning.
Words will become armor of light
in the battle for truth.

name: SHADOW ROBBER
desc:
You steal not gold, but meanings.
Shadow is your ally, silence is your weapon.
Words are hidden in pockets of oblivion,
and only you can retrieve them.

name: BARD OF RESONANT WORDS
desc:
The lute plays on the strings of reality.
Every word is a note of fate.
You breathe life into forgotten stories,
making the world listen.

name: ALCHEMIST OF ETERNITY
desc:
The crucible of your mind is boiling.
Letters mix, birthing formulas.
You transform chaos into meaning,
and words into the philosopher's stone.

name: DRUID OF ANCIENT GROVES
desc:
Roots whisper truth to you.
Words sprout like seeds.
You hear the language of forest and wind,
and translate it to the world.

name: NECROMANCER OF OBLIVION
desc:
You speak with what was forgotten.
Words lie in graves of memory.
You raise them from silence,
granting them a second life.

name: ENGINEER OF COSMOS
desc:
Thoughts are your blueprints.
Words are gears of meaning.
You assemble idea-constructions,
making the world work.

name: PSYCHIC OF MIND'S ABYSS
desc:
Thoughts are open to you.
Words float in the subconscious.
You fish them from the depths,
reading the mind like a book.

name: PRIEST OF LIGHT
desc:
Your faith is a source of power.
Words heal and purify.
You carry light through darkness,
expelling silence.

name: BERSERKER OF FURY
desc:
Fury boils in your blood.
Words burst out like a scream.
You shatter silence with force,
breaking barriers of meaning.

name: PALADIN OF OATH
desc:
Your oath is unbreakable.
Words are law and protection.
You stand for truth,
not allowing it to fall.

name: PILGRIM OF MEANINGS
desc:
Your journey is more important than the destination.
Every word is a step.
You collect truths along the road,
carrying them through the world.

name: SHAMAN OF SPIRITS
desc:
You hear voices of worlds.
Words are threads between realities.
You weave them into a whole,
connecting living and otherworldly.

name: JESTER OF ILLUSIONS
desc:
Your mask hides many faces.
Words dance between truth and deception.
You change reality with mind-games,
where every laugh is a conspiracy.

name: ELF OF ANCIENT FOREST
desc:
The song of centuries flows in your veins.
Words fly like arrows of truth.
You hear whispers of roots and wind,
protecting nature's secrets.

name: PIRATE OF SEA ROUTES
desc:
Your saber is but an extension of will.
Words are maps to hidden treasures.
You sail the ocean of meanings,
where every storm is a challenge.

name: DWARF OF DEEP CAVES
desc:
Your beard is a chronicle of stone.
Words are forged in ancestral forges.
You read runes in the rock,
keeping secrets of the underground kingdom.

name: BEAST OF PRIMAL FORCE
mission: Survive in the world of words!
desc:
Your claws embody instinct.
Words are roars, echoes of wild nature.
You sense fear and hunt,
living by pack laws.
